price: 39. Pero (este) se rebeló (contra la verdad) junto con su ejército y dijo (acerca de Moisés): «No es sino un brujo o un loco».
arabic: فَتَوَلَّىٰ بِرُكۡنِهِۦ وَقَالَ سَٰحِرٌ أَوۡ مَجۡنُونٞ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish. published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: fatawallā biruk'nihi waqāla sāḥirun aw majnūnun
